text: Fomɨra Israelia ko Judaba, me Godɨn akamɨn gɨn mangasa akar mam akɨri. Ezɨ puvatɨ, me anebigha uam arazir bar kurar mam gami. Arazir kurar kam me kantrin aven nguibabar bar a gamua, egha uaghan Jerusalemɨn a gami. Men gumazir maba, asebar ziaba fer adarazir amiziba isa dar iti. Ezɨ men arazir kam, Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Dɨpenir a bar ifongezim gamizɨ, a bar an damazimɨn mɨze.
